about_the_game:
Phoenix-Zero is a 3D, Isometric, MMO Bullet-Hell with Permadeath mechanics. Explore the steampunk world around you, fight enemies you find along the way, find better gear, upgrade and unlock new planes and classes, form teams with your friends and defeat powerful bosses as you progress in a chaotic animal warfare. Inspired by games like Steambirds Alliance and Realm of the Mad God, Phoenix-Zero will have you on the edge of your seat during the fast paced combat in the skies!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS


Phoenix-Zero is a game to be played with allies to tackle the most challenging foes: assemble your squad, explore the world, find dungeons and help the rebel force in the exciting fast-paced gameplay. As a Veteran, go to the lobby and find new players to aid them in battle with the tutor system and earn great rewards!

CHOOSE YOUR ROLE IN BATTLE


The many classes in Phoenix-Zero will let you assume the role in battle you desire! Be it a Medic, a Buffer, a Tank or a Deadly Fighter, anything goes!! And even if you are not satisfied, you can always try again with a new aircraft and find what suits you best in combat!

DEATH IS PERMANENT


Crashing in combat comes with a big punishment filling every risky moment with lots of adrenaline! Whenever you crash your plane, all the loot in your inventory, the upgrades and your plane level will be lost! But knowledge and skill are not lost, so be sure to store some of your loot in your trustworthy chest at the rebel bank to help you out whenever you start a new adventure and try again!!

LEVEL-UP YOUR PILOT


With the aid of our most advanced ejection technology and the best parachutes on the market, your pilot is safe from every crash!! Level-up at the Pilot Academy and unlock permanent upgrades to help you in your future adventures with whatever aircraft you choose to pilot!

FIGHT GREATER FOES FOR BETTER LOOT


High risk, high rewards! The more challenging a foe is, the better loot it'll drop, making every difficult combat and every near-death experience worthy of your precious time. With the aid of a team everything is possible especially with the skill and knowledge that you get with every new plane!

EXCITING BULLET-HELL BOSS FIGHTS


Be on the edge of your seat with every great foe your encounter, because every boss fight is hand-tailored by our developers to make for an exciting gameplay. Learn the patterns, learn to dodge, find the unique quirks of each boss and try to defeat them to grab the best loot possible! Don't get distracted or you might crash at some powerful attack!
